H0.text: The Salt Flat of Uyuni, the world's largest salt flat, is in which country. Argentina

H1.text: The Salt Flat of Uyuni, the world's largest salt flat, is in which country. Chile

H2.text: The Salt Flat of Uyuni, the world's largest salt flat, is in which country. Peru

H3.text: The Salt Flat of Uyuni, the world's largest salt flat, is in which country. Boliva

A4.text: It is situated in southwestern Bolivia

A5.text: the Salar de Uyuni is located in the Andean region of Bolivia

A6.text: the Salar de Uyuni is a salt flat in Bolivia
